website_summaries.verdict: The X Ultra 3 Prime GTX goes beyond giving users comfort and lightness. It also offers adequate surface traction and protection from the elements. All that said, the shoe may be a letdown to some because of its high price. All in all, the Salomon X Ultra 3 Prime GTX may be a fantastic pair for day hiking once buyers can get past its minor issues.
pros: A lot of adventurers agree that the Salomon X Ultra 3 Prime GTX is a satisfyingly comfortable hiking shoe
A majority of buyers find this footgear to be delightfully light
Based on a bunch of consumer reviews, its outsole performs well on dry and slippery surfaces
The Gore-Tex liner of this Salomon product is effective against various wet trail conditions, according to a handful of outdoorsy individuals
A minority of users mention that the X Ultra 3 Prime GTX’s arch support is sufficient for day hiking
A small number of shoppers report that its break-in period is short
cons: Several purchasers say that the Salomon X Ultra 3 Prime GTX is pricey
According to a customer, the lace that comes with the shoe starts to fray apart after a few uses
A few outdoor lovers declare the footgear’s toe box to be quite restrictive

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes once you know what size to order.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, and have three pairs. However, they must be tried on before purchase to find the correct size as they run very small.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots after reading other reviews. I was going on a walking holiday and often get severe pain in my foot due to arthritis and plantar fasciitis. From day one the boots were very comfy and gave excellent support making it possible for me to walk several miles each day. They were also waterproof as stated. I would highly recommend these boots.
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: Gortex
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike it’s comrfortable but not tested it for being warterproof yet
customer_reviews.author: pauline kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable dog walking boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size larger than my usual size. They are very comfortable and used for dog walking almost every day. So far they’ve proved to be waterproof. They took about a week to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Vivien Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not a wide toe box
customer_reviews.text: From the reviews, I thought these trainers would have a wide toe box - they haven't so unfortunately, I had to return mine.
customer_reviews.author: FeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love my salomon running shoes but wasn’t impressed with the walking shoes felt cheap and were really uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Adi Watson-Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great for my plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I need good footwear due to horrible plantar fasciitis. My old Salomon ankle length walking boots are worn out decided to try a shorter one and went for these. Arrived very quickly and v good packaging. Fit perfect and give me excellent support. I had an appointment this week for new orthotics and he said they are an excellent shoe for my condition. Highly recommend 👍
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Sadly not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, look good, laces stay in place and waterproof - these Salomon trainers were at first the best pair of trainers I have bought. Three weeks into wearing them they have stopped being waterproof, I walked through short damp grass and both of my feet got soaked. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: KSArts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I love Salomon shoes and the fact they are comfortable from day 1.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Not generous sizing- but otherwise good!
customer_reviews.text: I usually take a 5 or 5.5 and everyone says buy half a size bigger, so I got a 6. I like to wear 2 pairs of socks, but the first time I put them on, luckily around the house, they felt tight. So much so, I checked the label inside to make sure they were a 6! Maybe in time they will 'give' a bit. With one pair of socks they are fine- and on the first walk of 12kms, I only got one small blister on my heel. They are otherwise comfortable, sturdy and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie88

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Solomon woman’s ultra 3 after a lot of study . I payed £110 thinking I had bought the best . I too suffer with planta fasciitis and with my job as a post woman I needed good waterproof footwear . After yesterday in heavy rain I realised these are not waterproof . Very disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and supportive walking shoes. I wore these for a 26mile hike and my feet knit started to get sore towards the end.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Turner

product_meta.title: Salomon Women's X Ultra 3 Prime GTX W Waterproof Hiking and Multisport Shoes
product_meta.description: If you want a high performance fit and details without looking overly technical, the X ULTRA PRIME 3 is the shoe for you. It offers the same comfort, stability and fit as the X ULTRA 3, but with a cleaner, classic look. Waterproof: Waterproof Gore-Tex lining to keep your feet dry at all times . Enhanced chassis: Salomon's lightweight advanced chassis, placed between the outsole and midsole, maximizes motion control, energy management and push through protection for an efficient, stable and responsive ride. Fit management: Sensifit cradles the foot from the midsole to the lacing system, providing a secure, snug and virtually customizable fit all around the foot.
